sentences.text: I'm telling you, man. I saw someone out there!
sentences.speaker: Small Ghost

sentences.text: Dude, how many times do I gotta tell you?
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost

sentences.text: Nobody is out there anymore. Not since the tower boys drove them away
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost

sentences.text: Maybe it was one of them, then!
sentences.speaker: Small Ghost

sentences.text: I seriously doubt that man. You literally think everything is a person
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost

sentences.text: First its some gray guy you said was playing music
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost

sentences.text: Now its a guy in an orange coat-
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost

sentences.text: Well I guess it was kind of an off pink, but still pink
sentences.speaker: Small Ghost

sentences.text: Their coat wasn't pink. It wasn't a coat at all because you saw nothing.
sentences.speaker: Large Ghost
